metadata.feature_description: Compare analytics data between two different time periods to identify trends

steps.actual: Login successful, PersonaBar visible with Dashboard, Content, Manage, Page Analytics, Settings icons

steps.action: Clicked Dashboard in PersonaBar to expand menu
steps.expected: Dashboard submenu shows with Site Analytics and Community Analytics options
steps.actual: Dashboard submenu expanded showing Site Analytics and Community Analytics options

steps.expected: Community Analytics panel loads with dashboard, period selector, and comparative term controls
steps.actual: Panel remains completely blank. JavaScript error in console: TypeError: utility.serializeCustomDate is not a function

issues: CRITICAL: Community Analytics module fails to initialize due to JavaScript error: TypeError: utility.serializeCustomDate is not a function
Error occurs in social-dashboard-combined-instance.js at line 1025
The utility.serializeCustomDate function is called but does not exist, causing the entire module to fail to load

steps.action: Attempted to access Community Analytics Comparison View
steps.expected: Period comparison UI loads with dropdown selectors
steps.actual: Cannot test - Community Analytics module fails to load due to JavaScript error

issues: Cannot test - Community Analytics module is non-functional

steps.action: Attempted to view percentage changes between periods
steps.expected: Percentage change indicators visible showing comparison data
steps.actual: Cannot test - Community Analytics module fails to load due to JavaScript error

issues: Cannot test - Community Analytics module is non-functional

steps.expected: Up/down trend indicators visible based on comparison data
steps.actual: Cannot test - Community Analytics module fails to load due to JavaScript error

issues: Cannot test - Community Analytics module is non-functional

steps.action: Attempted to verify calculation accuracy of comparisons
steps.expected: Accurate percentage calculations displayed comparing two periods
steps.actual: Cannot test - Community Analytics module fails to load due to JavaScript error

issues: Cannot test - Community Analytics module is non-functional

steps.action: Attempted to test comparison when no previous period data exists
steps.expected: Appropriate message or handling when no comparison data available
steps.actual: Cannot test - Community Analytics module fails to load due to JavaScript error

issues: Cannot test - Community Analytics module is non-functional

steps.action: Attempted to test comparisons across Year, Month, Week, Day period types
steps.expected: Comparative term options change based on selected period (1y, 1m, 1w, 1d)
steps.actual: Cannot test - Community Analytics module fails to load due to JavaScript error

issues: Cannot test - Community Analytics module is non-functional

observations: Code review shows Comparative Analytics feature is implemented with comparativeTerm parameter in all API endpoints (GetDashboardInfo, GetTagStats, GetPopularContent, etc.)
Frontend code in analytics.js defines comparativeTerms object mapping periods to comparison values: Year->1y, Month->1m, Week->1w, Day->1d
Resource file contains localized tooltip strings for comparison messages (e.g., 'Up 5% today compared to yesterday')
The Community Analytics module completely fails to initialize due to missing utility.serializeCustomDate function
This appears to be a dependency/integration issue where the utility object does not have the serializeCustomDate method available when the module initializes
All Comparative Analytics tests cannot be executed because the parent module (Community Analytics) is broken
